trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Batavia
There were no other sightings in Batavia on or around September 19th 2009
divs: sighting detailsa bright light appeared in sky to the s\se. it was a flooding light that pointed like a flash light down towards ground. it suddenly vanished leaving a almost smoky after affect. there were about 6 witnesses standing around a bonfire at the time.
